title: What Makes Andorra the World’s Safest Country? How Safety Rankings Impact Travel to Places Like the UK and USA
description:
What Makes Andorra the World’s Safest Country? How Safety Rankings Impact Travel to Places Like the UK and USA

Andorra has emerged as the world’s safest country for 2025 according to a global safety index study by Numbeo. The study rated 146 countries across the globe, assessing them based on a ran...
